subject: JUint failed its own test
msgSnippet: I ve been working my way through Junit Recipes and, as suggested, ran Junit test suite on Junit.  I got an error.  I could not find a recipe in chapter eight
messageBody:
I've been working my way through Junit Recipes and, as suggested,
ran Junit test suite on Junit. I got an error. I could not find a
recipe in chapter eight that would fit this problem. What did I do wrong?

Details follow:

Joel Altman
Shuttle Training Aircraft
Aircraft Simulation Program
